axisDirection.description: The axis direction containing the color configuration to represent.

axisId.description: The id of the axis item with the color configuration to represent.

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.

direction.description: The direction of the legend layout.

typeDescriptions.params: The bound of the piece to format.
typeDescriptions.string | null: The displayed label, '' to skip the label but show the color mark, or null to skip it entirely.

labelPosition.description: Where to position the labels relative to the gradient. The positions 'below' and 'left', as well as 'above' and 'right' are equivalent.

onItemClick.description: Callback fired when a legend item is clicked.

typeDescriptions.index: The index of the clicked legend item.

above.nodeName: the legend with the labels above the color marks

below.nodeName: the legend with the labels below the color marks

extremes.nodeName: the legend with the labels on the extremes of the color marks

left.nodeName: the legend with the labels on the left of the color marks

maxLabel.nodeName: the list item that renders the maxLabel

minLabel.nodeName: the list item that renders the minLabel

right.nodeName: the legend with the labels on the right of the color marks

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.
